item.title: Kong Dynamic Plugin Ordering
item.description: TL;DR Kong Gateway provides dynamic plugin ordering allowing administrators to control plugin execution order. Dynamic plugin ordering was added in Kong Enterprise 3.0 and the full technical reference is available in the official documentation. Kong Gateway: API sentinel Kong Gateway is a lightweight, fast, and flexible API gateway. An API gateway is a reverse proxy that sits between your APIs and the consumers of them. Think of Kong Gateway as a guard at the door for your APIs.

item.title: Kong Builders Stream - June 8th 2022
item.description: Table of Contents YouTube link Plugins Bot Detection Proxy Cache Metrics with Prometheus and Grafana In this episode of Kong Builders, we took a look at some Kong Gateway OSS Plugins and how to run those in Kubernetes with Kong Ingress Controller.
